name: @nota/nativescript-accessibility-ext
description: Nativescript plugin for enabling accessibility features

scripts.postinstall: npm run pack:plugin && npm run install:demo
scripts.demo:android: npm run install:demo && cd demo && tns debug android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo:ios: npm run install:demo && cd demo && tns debug ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.bundle:android: npm run install:demo && cd demo && npm run start-android-bundle
scripts.bundle:ios: npm run install:demo && cd demo && npm run start-ios-bundle
scripts.install:demo: npm run build && cd demo && npm i && npm prune
scripts.sass: cd src && rm -rf css && node-sass --recursive --output css scss
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run sass
